Package juniter.repository.jpa

Interface BlockRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockLocalValid, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Block,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Block,java.lang.Long>, LocalValid, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Block,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Block>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Block,java.lang.Long>
    @Repository
public interface BlockRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Block,java.lang.Long>, BlockLocalValid
    Repository to manage Block instances.
